level.heading: Rules and procedures.
level.text: The Mayor, in consultation with WASA, is authorized to promulgate rules and to establish procedures to implement this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 6016 of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-486, August 2, 2004, 51 DCR 8236).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 6016 of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-594, October 26, 2004, 51 DCR 11725).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-205
level.text: For Law 15-205, see notes following ยง 34-2151.
